benchmark_details.name: SolEval
benchmark_details.overview: SolEval is the first repository-level benchmark for Solidity smart contract generation, consisting of 1,507 samples from 28 different repositories across 6 popular domains, designed to evaluate the performance of LLMs on Solidity.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the effectiveness of LLMs in generating secure and efficient Solidity smart contracts.
audience: Developers working with blockchain and smart contracts

data.source: Samples collected from public GitHub repositories focused on Solidity smart contracts.
data.annotation: Manually annotated by students with Solidity experience.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the number of functions that pass tests or meet gas efficiency requirements.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@k indicates better performance at generating functional Solidity code.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated using unit tests from the repositories.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected from publicly available repositories with no private information.
